title: Increasing Reading Compliance of Undergraduates An Evaluation of Compliance Methods
excerpt: Abstract A common source of frustration for college instructors is getting their students to read. Since the 1970s, studies have shown that no more than 30 percent of students complete a reading assignment on any given day. But what can be done? What strategies  ...

title: Get Up, Stand Up! Higher Order Thinking in Popular Music Studies
excerpt: This study focuses on the application of higher order thinking skills in general education popular music studies at the post-secondary level. The literature review explores the history of post-secondary general education music courses (also known as “music appreciation”)  ...

title: North Central Sociological Association Presidential Address 2014: Positively Teaching Positive Sociology
